description: 26/09/23-awaiting internal confirmation that none of below are TPOdT1 - Paulineia - Front grounds - Prune back to previous points of reduction approx. 1.5-2m, remove any dead woodT2 - London Plane (Platanus x hispanica) XXL - Front grounds - thorough climbing inspection - Clean out crown, remove lowest limb growing over car park, approx. dia. 15cm - remove any dead wood.T3 - Lime (Tilia spp) - Front grounds - cyclical prune; T4 - Lime  (Tilia spp) - front grounds - cyclical pruneT5 - Field Maple (Acer campestre) - rear grounds - Crown reduce by 30% approx. 2m from height, reduce laterally by 2.2.5m, all  overhang to be pruned back from the adjacent property - clean out the crown and remove any dead woodT6 - Magnolia (Magnolia spp) - Side grounds - Reduce the crown by approx. 1.5-2m from height, 1m from laterals, blending with the upper crown.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
